description.narrative: The investment aims to develop and implement the Estimation of Emission of Greenhouse Gases produced by the agricultural/stockbreeding sector. An evaluation is performed of the emissions of greenhouse effect gases in Peru for the agricultural/stockbreeding sector. The growth in Agricultural/Stockbreeding GDP and the dynamism of Agricultural exports reveals possible growth indexes in the emission of Greenhouse Gases due to the intensification of productive and economic activities in the sector. Based on the amounts of emissions of Greenhouse Gases obtained for the year 2012, past emissions for the years 1990 through 2012 will be calculated, as well as updates subsequent to 2013. The investment is made in alliance with the Universidad Nacional Agraria La Molina through the University’s Foundation for Agrarian Development. In this sense, the following investment is supported, which is part of an integrated Peruvian SEEG that will contribute to knowledge, information transparency, and responsibility regarding the sector, inputs, and practices that generate Greenhouse Gases. Within the framework of the COP20, the investment is key.
